K12D0437_H0411:278a-1: a'ar+ya t'a re ku ru kulle kalpa /
K12D0437_H0411:278b-0: 'phags ma sgrol ma ku @278b ru kulle'i rtog pa /
K12D0437_H0411:278b-1: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-2: 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-3: sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi ni //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-4: gzhung dang rtog pa nyams shing nub par gyur nas yang //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-5: sgrol ma 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin zhes bya rgyud kyi gtso //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-6: de yang nub par gyur nas rtog pa 'di yang 'byung //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-7: sems can mang po'i don du rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-8: rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud las bsdus byas nas //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-9: rtog pa 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gsungs //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyan par gyis //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-11: 'jig rten skyabs med gyur la rnam bltas nas //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-12: 'gro kun don byed pa yi tshul 'di ni //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-13: sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-14: gus pa chen pos khyod kyi sa blang bar byos //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-15: 'jig rten rnam rtog zhi bar bya phyir rtog pa 'di //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni rab tu gsungs //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-17: dpal ldan gru 'dzin ri la 'jam dpal dang //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-18: padma bsnams dang rgyal bar byed pa dang //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-19: sgrib pa rnam sel blo gros rgya mtsho dang //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-20: byams pa la sogs tshogs rnams thams cad kyis //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-21: gang yang chos kyi tshig 'di thos gyur nas //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-22: rjes su yi rang spyi bos gus phyag byas //
K12D0437_H0411:278b-23: rgyal ba'i sras kyis mnga' byas bstod pa'am //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-2: sna tshogs gar gyis 'di ni mchod pa byas //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-3: gnod sbyin srin po yi dvags 'jig rten dang //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-4: sna tshogs bu mo dang ni rgyu skar dang //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-5: sa yi dbang dang lag na rdo rje dang //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-6: rlabs rnams sna tshogs can gang gnas pa yi //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-7: klu yi bu mo zur gyis lta bas blta ba dang //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-8: sa 'og skyong dang lha dbang grub pa'i bu mos mchod //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-9: dri za'i rgyal mo nu ma shin tu rgyas pa dang //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-10: rig pa 'dzin dang mi 'am ci yi chung ma dang //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-11: gnod sbyin chung ma ri yi bu mo'i bu dag ni //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-12: gang yin bdag dang skyabs med ces ni 'di skad smra //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-13: gang phyir skyabs med skyabs gyur sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dir //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-14: mgon med mgon gyur 'jig rten mgon po khyod //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-15: bde ba bskyed cing ngo mtshar che gyur gang //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-16: mgon po tshogs kyi tshig dbang 'di thos nas //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-17: nyid kyi dbang du byed pa'i gsang sngags gsungs //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-18: sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kun thos pas //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-19: mthar thug sangs rgyas bde ba du ma 'byung //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-20: rdo rje reg pas khams kyang 'dzag par 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-21: zur gyis lta bar byed pas lta byed cing //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-22: rkang pa dag kyang sa la gya tshom 'dor //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-23: 'dod chags shin tu bde bas khu 'bab tshe //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-24: 'di ltar mthong nas lha yi bu mo la //
K12D0437_H0411:279a-25: 'gro ba dbang byed ku ru kulle'i sngags //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-0: ras ris bris dang @279b gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-1: dus la bab pa'i tshig 'di mgon smros zhes //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-2: de ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-3: de tshe 'jig rten dbang phyug las rnams rab tu gsungs //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-4: ku ru kulle'i ri mo'i lugs //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-5: gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-6: sgrub pa po yis 'bras thob pa //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-7: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-8: ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-9: tshes grangs gang dang dus gang la //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-10: sgrol ma 'byung las bshad pa bzhin //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-11: de ni bdag gis bshad par bya //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-12: ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-13: gang gi mig ni dmar 'gyur zhing //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-14: lag pa de bzhin rkang pa dmar //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-15: bya yi mig can aa n+ya'i rkang //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-16: des ni sgrol ma bri bar bya //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-17: dpyid kyi zla ba dang po yi //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-18: mya ngan med pa'i tshes brgyad nyin //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-19: thun ni phyed dang gnyis pa la //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-20: sgrol ma'i mig ni bri bar bya //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-21: mngar gsum bza' zhing nya la sogs //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-22: sha dang chang yang spang bar bya //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-23: dmar po'i gos kyang rtag tu bgo /
K12D0437_H0411:279b-24: dmar po'i dri yis rtag tu byug /
K12D0437_H0411:279b-25: byams pa'i sems ni bskyed byas la //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-26: tho rangs khrus byas bsangs nas su //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-27: lan gsum gos ni brjes byas su //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-28: dbang du byed ma yang dag bri //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-29: zhal gcig mig ni yangs pa dang //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-30: phyag bzhi ma la gur gum mdog /
K12D0437_H0411:279b-31: bcu drug lo lon sgeg bcas 'dra //
K12D0437_H0411:279b-32: bud med sgyu mas rgyags pa bri //
K12D0437_H0411:280a-0: gzhon nu ma dmar ser mos byas @280a *//
K12D0437_H0411:280a-1: pa'i skud pa las ras byas la /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-2: de dang thags mkhan gnyis ka zan dang /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-4: de nas padma'i gdan la stod g-yogs dmar po'i gos dang bcas pas rin po che'i rna cha dang /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-5: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-6: g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-7: gnyis pas mda' rna rtser 'gengs pa /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-9: autpal dmar po gnyis pa na bsnams pa dang /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-10: 'od dpag med cod pan na bzhugs pa ri'i phug na gnas pa'i ku ru kulle'o //
K12D0437_H0411:280a-11: ku ru kulle'i 'og tu ni sgra gcan 'dzin no //
K12D0437_H0411:280a-12: de'i steng du 'dod pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa'o //
K12D0437_H0411:280a-13: 'dod pa'i lha'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12D0437_H0411:280a-14: de la padma dmar po'i gdan no //
K12D0437_H0411:280a-15: de la gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can
K12D0437_H0411:280a-16: gyi bcom ldan 'das ma bris la ras ris rab
K12D0437_H0411:280a-18: de'i mdun du mchod pa rnam pa bco brgyad byas
K12D0437_H0411:280a-19: la yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad zla ba nya'i bar
K12D0437_H0411:280a-21: sgrol ma'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-22: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: h'um sv'ah'a /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-24: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum tsam byas la /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-25: yang ston zla tha chung ngam /
K12D0437_H0411:280a-27: dbyar zla 'bring po'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i dus
K12D0437_H0411:280a-28: tshigs kyi nyin par tho rangs kyi khrus byas la
K12D0437_H0411:280b-0: gso @280b sbyong bzung nas mchod pa thams cad kyis
K12D0437_H0411:280b-1: mchod la / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchod rten gsol //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-2: de nas theg pa chen po gsang sngags pa'i tshogs
K12D0437_H0411:280b-3: la mchod ston byas nas yon phul la pus mo
K12D0437_H0411:280b-4: g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K12D0437_H0411:280b-5: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang bar bya'o //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-6: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gang na bzhugs pa dang /
K12D0437_H0411:280b-7: theg pa chen po la dga' ba'i tshogs rnams la phyag byas nas bzod par gsol te /
K12D0437_H0411:280b-8: gang na bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras ris bkram pa'i phyogs der nye bar song la /
K12D0437_H0411:280b-9: dngos grub gang 'dod pa'i don du rig pa 'dzin
K12D0437_H0411:280b-10: pas bsam gtan dang ldan par gnas la yi ge
K12D0437_H0411:280b-12: cha gcig gis ni shes rab 'phel //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-13: cha gnyis kyis ni dbang du byed //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-14: gang zhig cha ni gsum pa yis //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-16: tshogs shing 'gying pa'i bud med rnams dang ni; ;'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mchod par 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-17: sbyor ba goms pas lha mo mdzes rnams la //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-18: sngags 'chang des ni ji ltar 'dod par spyod //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-19: de yi ming tsam gyis ni mtshungs med dug can 'bros pa dang //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-20: gdengs ka'i gtso bo'i 'od kyis dpal ldan dag kyang nya bzhin 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:280b-21: bzlas brjod ldan pa yis ni dag gi dbang phyug byed 'gyur bas //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-1: pas 'gyings pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa'ang lan mi byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-2: rig pa 'dzin pa glang po rta yi rgyab tu zhon pa dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-3: rig ma mdzes mas legs par 'khyud cing mgul nas 'jus pa las //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-4: sngags rig pa yi gtso bo yi ni stobs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-5: mthar gyur pa yi rgyal srid longs spyod dag la yid kyis spyod //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-6: 'dod pa'i lha las dga' ba'i bu la sogs pa ri khrod ma //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-7: sred med bu las dpal mo mi phyed pa las bde sogs dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-8: tshogs bdag las ni dri med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dkar mo dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-9: sa 'dzin lha las phun tshogs mnga' ba sngags kyis rnam rgyal byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-10: gsang sngags ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma gang zhig sgom byed pa //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-11: des ni sna tshogs gter dang gser dang dngul dang rna cha dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-12: gos la sogs pa'i nor rnams kun la ched du gang bsams pa //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-13: sems kyis thams cad ma lus kun nas longs spyod byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-14: rgyal las rgyal srid dbang po'i yul 'das pa yi shing las 'bras bu dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-15: klu dang chu klung rgya mtsho rnams las chu rnams 'gugs //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-16: sngags dang ldan pas 'thung zhing zas la sngags kyis dag par byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281a-17: skye bo sngags med par ni longs spyod grub pa med //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-0: nags skyes glang po rta mchog @281b ri dvags dang ldan pa //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-1: dug bcas gdengs ka can gyi sprul mchog dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-2: chu srin chu glang stag dang bse dag dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-3: rang gi sngags kyi stobs kyis bkug nas ni //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-4: zhon yang ngo mtshar med par byas pa'i yid ni mig dag gis //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-5: lta bar gal te gsang sngags grub pa de yis mthong bar 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-6: gal te snying rje'i lta bas 'jig rten 'di ltar sdug bsngal pas //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-7: rgud par gyur pa'i mi mnyam pa la sngags pa des //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-8: yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'jig rten la phan sgrol ma yin //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-9: 'jig rten ma lus sgrol mar byed cing zhi bar byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-10: bdud rnams bcom nas nor gyi char rgyun 'bebs par byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-11: dpag bsam shing du gyur nas 'gro rnams ci 'dod sbyin par byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-12: nor gyi dbang phyug ma lus pa yi nor rnams kun bkug nas //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-13: sems can ma lus kun la phan phyir sbyin par byed //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-14: de bzhin phongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams phyir gos dag dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-15: stan dang khyim dang bla re dag tu sgrol ma dang //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-16: rgya mtsho'i gling du tshong pa'i gru zhig phongs pa la //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-17: gzings dang gru la sogs par sgrol mas mdzad par 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-18: sgrol ma de bsgoms rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-19: dang po sdug bsngal gyur pa de //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-20: de spangs nas ni cung zhig na //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-21: mis ni ston mo rnyed par 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-22: gnyis par gos ni rnyed par 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:281b-23: de bzhin btsun mo dang yang 'phrad //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-2: ma blangs par yang ci 'dod spyod //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-3: gal te tshangs spyod yin na yang //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-4: lha mchog bskyed pa'i bu mo spyod //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-5: sems can gsod la dga' ba yis //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-7: dge ba bcu la dga' 'gyur zhing //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-8: theg pa che la sems gcig pas //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-9: rdo rje chos kyi bka' bzhin du //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-10: dngos grub mchog ni des spyod 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-11: 'di ni ras ris la 'jug pa'i rtog pa ste dang po'o ////
K12D0437_H0411:282a-12: chos mchod pa yi sbyor ba yis //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-13: gang gis chos nyid brnyes gyur na //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-14: chos kyi dbyings su rang gyur pa //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-15: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-16: de'i rjes la dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-17: brag gi yi ge las byung ba; ;dpag bsam shing ni rnam par sgom //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-18: autpal yongs su gyur pa las //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-19: shing ni g-yon du bsgom par bya //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-20: sna tshogs nor gyi char pa dag /
K12D0437_H0411:282a-21: nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab pa yis //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-22: 'dod pa'i bsam pa rdzogs byed pa //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-23: de ltar bsgom na nor bdag 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-24: gling bzhi pa yi sems can rnams //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-25: sems kyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-26: rtag tu rin chen bdun rang bzhin //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-27: de dag la ni rab sbyin bya //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-28: yongs kyi gtso bo rin chen dang //
K12D0437_H0411:282a-29: de bzhin rin chen rgya mtsho skyes //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-0: bud med rin chen rta rin @282b chen //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-1: de bzhin ral gri rin chen dang //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-2: glang po rin chen sogs rin chen //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-3: sangs rgyas rnams la yid kyis dbul //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-4: bud med rgyan gyis brgyan byas la //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-5: sna tshogs gzugs can 'gying ba rnams //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-7: sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu dbul //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-8: 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-10: rin po che ni yongs rgyas pa'i //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-11: yongs kyi gtso bo nor dbang phyug /
K12D0437_H0411:282b-13: sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya; ;de bzhin rin chen gzhan dag kyang //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-14: gus dang bcas pas yongs btang na //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-15: rdo rje chos su gyur nas ni //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-16: sems can kun gyi don byed 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-17: 'di ni dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-18: sems nyid sangs rgyas thams cad do //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-19: sems nyid kyis ni rnam par grol //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-20: sems kyi 'ching ba rnams las thar //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-21: sems kyis grol ba dang ldan 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-22: sems ma gtogs par dngos don rnams //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-23: gzhan dag gzhan par ma mthong ste //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-24: sangs rgyas nyid dang dngos grub kun //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-25: gang phyir phun tshogs gnan [?] ma mthong //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-26: gang yang snod dang sems can rnams //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-28: zag med lhag par mthong ba yis //
K12D0437_H0411:282b-29: sems tsam yin zhes rab tu bsgrags //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-2: sems kyi me long phyis byas na //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-3: rang bzhin glo bur ba yi skyon //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-4: rim gyis rab tu zad par 'gyur //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-5: dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-6: dri med rdzogs pa'i zla ba ste //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-7: sems nyid zla ba bsgoms byas nas //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-8: de yi steng du sa bon dgod //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-9: dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa ni //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-10: me yi mdog gi steng na gnas //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-11: yi ge ai dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-12: nam mkha' gnyis kyi rnam par brgyan //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-13: de yi sna tshogs 'ong rnams kyis //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-14: 'gro ba dri ma med byas nas //
K12D0437_H0411:283a-15: stong gsum 'di sogs mkha' dbyings te //
